In Libya, rebels say forces loyal to Gadhafi fire rockets at opposition fighters near the border with Tunisia.
Doctors in Mogadishu, Somalia say young children are increasingly becoming victims of continued fighting in capital.
An angry crowd in Mexico City tries to lynch four suspected criminals and riot police are called in to disperse the mob.
In Kenya, a six story building collapses in Nairobi trapping an unknown number of people inside.
Weapons caches, Turkish mobile phones, passports, and car bombs are found in Jisr al-Shughour after the Syrian army leaves.
Seven Republican contenders gather in New Hampshire for the first US Presidential Debate of the 2012 race.
